documents.title: Q4 Financial Report 2024
documents.content: Revenue exceeded targets by 15% reaching ₹50 crore. Key drivers: enterprise contracts (40%), new product launches (35%), geographic expansion (25%).

documents.title: GDPR Compliance Guide
documents.content: Personal data must be retained for no longer than necessary. Right to erasure requires deletion within 30 days. Data breach notification required within 72 hours.

documents.title: Employee Onboarding Process
documents.content: Week 1: IT setup, access provisioning. Week 2: Department orientation, mentor assignment. Week 3: Project introduction, training modules.

documents.title: Contracts Expiring Q2 2024
documents.content: 15 vendor contracts expiring: Cloud hosting (March 31), Security audit (April 15), Software licenses (May 30). Renewal negotiations required 60 days prior.

documents.title: Audit Findings - Financial Controls 2024
documents.content: 3 minor findings identified: approval workflow gaps (Finance), access review delays (IT), segregation of duties (Operations). Remediation plan submitted.

shared_db.description: One database, logical isolation via tenant_id filters and namespaces
shared_db.use_case: 80% of GCC tenants with standard security requirements

shared_schema.description: Tenant_id column with PostgreSQL RLS policies for automatic filtering

separate_db.description: Dedicated PostgreSQL and vector database per tenant

hybrid.use_case: GCC production recommendation for cost optimization
